sentences.en: But that's naive -- and even disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 这种说法很天真,甚至于不坦诚.

sentences.en: Even so, much of what Mr Obama said was disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 即便如此, 奥巴马先生所谈论的还是有所保留.

sentences.en: His brother Shura with staring disingenuous eyes was plotting to master the world.
sentences.cn: 他那长着一对狡诈眼睛的哥哥瑞拉,处心积虑图谋征服整个世界.

sentences.en: It is disingenuous of him to flatter me.
sentences.cn: 他对我阿谀奉承,是居心叵测.

sentences.en: It would be disingenuous of me to claim I had never seen it.
sentences.cn: 要说我从未看到过，那就是言不由衷了。

sentences.en: It would be disingenuous to claim that this is great art.
sentences.cn: 称这是艺术瑰宝是言不由衷。

sentences.en: Keeping the details of the tax changes vague is disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 对税收变革的细节含糊其词并不光明正大。

sentences.en: More than that he seems disingenuous; in fact, his smile looks phony too.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者,他似乎并无诚意, 事实上, 他的笑容也显得虚伪.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, it would be disingenuous to suggest that foraging is always straight - forward and easy.
sentences.cn: 然而, 将觅食认为总是直接而容易的行动却是虚伪的表现.

sentences.en: The answers they receive from admission professionals often sound evasive disingenuous, and even haughty.
sentences.cn: 他们从招生专家那里得到的答案往往是推托的,不真诚的, 甚至傲慢的.

sentences.en: The book is entertaining, meandering and at times disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 这本书很有趣, 也很调侃,并且有时,不那么真诚.

sentences.en: This is at best disingenuous and does not justify a failure to inform and consult people.
sentences.cn: 这充其量不过是种言不由衷的辩解,不能成为未提醒用户和未征询用户意见的理由.

sentences.en: To and innocent about these problems at this late date is either remarkably ignorant or disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 迟至今日,如果还有人对这些问题一脸天真、惊奇讶异,他们要么是极端无知,要么是毫不实诚.

sentences.en: To attribute that entirely to Mr Obama would be disingenuous.
sentences.cn: 把这完全归咎于奥巴马是不诚实的.

words.tran_cn: 虚伪的；不诚实的；不老实的；狡猾的
